meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02271.4. The red needle on the circular dial is pointing slightly past the '0.03' mark. Following the rule to interpolate to one decimal tick (0.01 resolution) and selecting the closest mark, the dial reading is 0.03. The angle is estimated based on the position of the 0.03 mark relative to the 12 o'clock position (0 degrees).
